title: Track our progress: Trade Remedies Authority case milestones – Nov 2022

content.text: Subscribe below to receive the latest update on our interactive case tracker, which shows the progress of each of our cases as they go through the investigation lifecycle.
This month’s tracker shows progress on our cases during October and the data is correct as of 10 November 2022.

Subscribe here to receive automatic monthly updates of our interactive case tracker and view each stage of a case investigation in detail, from initiation stage to the final decision by Secretary of State.
You can view further information about investigations currently in progress on the TRA gov.uk page.
